data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Cursed Kingdoms Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Cursed Kingdoms Music Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Cursed Kingdoms Music Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Venture into the unknown with twenty tracks of dark fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Folk sounds from ancient times mix with metal guitar and eerie atmospheres to offer you a distinctly dangerous sound. Stirring themes evoke the unsettling mood of a place lost to otherworldly enemies and chaotic magic. You will find a little solace and a lot of adventure in this collection of troubled tracks! Features: * 20 music tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes and towns! * 13 ME Musical Events for short dramatic moments! * .ogg and .m4a formats included. * Royalty-free music for use with RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice! Tracklist: * 20 BGM Battle - Eldritch Enemies Battle - Golem Grinder Battle - Metal Monsters Battle - Unnatural Usurpers Battle - Weird Warriors Dungeon - Beastly Barrows Dungeon - Cadaverous Calm Dungeon - Deeper Delvings Dungeon - Twisted Tombs Dungeon - Whispering Walls Theme - Cursed Kingdoms Theme - Fallen Empire Theme - Opening The Portal Theme - Otherworlders Theme - Wayfarers Path Town - Last Village Town - Portal Chamber Town - Ruined Castle Town - Shrine of Contemplation Town - Temporary Shelter * 13 ME Evil x 2 tracks Heroic x 2 tracks Rest x 3 tracks Scary x 4 tracks Suspenseful x 2 tracks
data.about_the_game:
Venture into the unknown with twenty tracks of dark fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Folk sounds from ancient times mix with metal guitar and eerie atmospheres to offer you a distinctly dangerous sound. Stirring themes evoke the unsettling mood of a place lost to otherworldly enemies and chaotic magic. You will find a little solace and a lot of adventure in this collection of troubled tracks!

Features:

* 20 music tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, themes and towns!
* 13 ME Musical Events for short dramatic moments!
* .ogg and .m4a formats included.
* Royalty-free music for use with RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

* 20 BGM

Battle - Eldritch Enemies
Battle - Golem Grinder
Battle - Metal Monsters
Battle - Unnatural Usurpers
Battle - Weird Warriors
Dungeon - Beastly Barrows
Dungeon - Cadaverous Calm
Dungeon - Deeper Delvings
Dungeon - Twisted Tombs
Dungeon - Whispering Walls
Theme - Cursed Kingdoms
Theme - Fallen Empire
Theme - Opening The Portal
Theme - Otherworlders
Theme - Wayfarers Path
Town - Last Village
Town - Portal Chamber
Town - Ruined Castle
Town - Shrine of Contemplation
Town - Temporary Shelter

* 13 ME

Evil x 2 tracks
Heroic x 2 tracks
Rest x 3 tracks
Scary x 4 tracks
Suspenseful x 2 tracks
data.short_description: Dark fantasy music for a trip into the depths of the Cursed Kingdoms!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
